name: Frontnite
description:
A fun tower defense game with a ton of units on screen. You can spawn 5 types of units (Pikeman, Knight, Archer, Darkmage and Whitemage), upgrade them and fight!  

The Pikemen are fast, 

The Knights hit hard,

The Archers fight from afar,

The Darkmage brings enemies to the brink of death,

The Whitemage turns the foe into friend.

v1.0.1 fixed an issue with difficulty
